channel.title: Comments on: Wanking AFKs Ruin Another Young Life

item.title: By: marlz33
item.dc:creator: marlz33
item.description: That's what I refer to as too much information. Last time I checked we weren't receiving money as this guy's sex therapist so why subject people to that?! Honestly?!?!
item.content:encoded: That’s what I refer to as too much information. Last time I checked we weren’t receiving money as this guy’s sex therapist so why subject people to that?! Honestly?!?!

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Ya, cuz it was so damn stupid.
I apologize for forcing that tale of horror on unsuspecting readers. I should have put a warning up front on that shit.
item.content:encoded:
Ya, cuz it was so damn stupid.

I apologize for forcing that tale of horror on unsuspecting readers. I should have put a warning up front on that shit.

item.title: By: The Romans are Coming
item.dc:creator: The Romans are Coming
item.description: So, posting personal details is bad, and you don't like it - but you read through that entire thing and decided to post it on your blog.
item.content:encoded: So, posting personal details is bad, and you don’t like it – but you read through that entire thing and decided to post it on your blog.

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: If that was me, the serious note would have been the limp dick and the aside would have been the fact that I was giving WoW a rest. Although I gotta say that this story sets off the BS detector.
item.content:encoded: If that was me, the serious note would have been the limp dick and the aside would have been the fact that I was giving WoW a rest. Although I gotta say that this story sets off the BS detector.

item.title: By: Mannox
item.dc:creator: Mannox
item.description: LMAO!! This is some funny shit! It makes one ask...is this really true? And then further if it is true why would he put it out there in the public eye? If it isn't true why would he make that shit up? Either way this guy is a whack job...both literally and figuritively!
item.content:encoded: LMAO!! This is some funny shit! It makes one ask…is this really true? And then further if it is true why would he put it out there in the public eye? If it isn’t true why would he make that shit up? Either way this guy is a whack job…both literally and figuritively!

item.title: By: Anon

item.description:
WTB V14GR4 or CI4|_15 4TW.
